snippet: The breast cancer charity Susan G. Komen for the Cure said Tuesday that it was canceling walks next year in seven cities where fund-raising goals have not been met.
abstract: Breast cancer charity Susan G Komen for the Cure says it is canceling walks next year in seven cities where fund-raising goals have not been met; charity caused uproar after it sought to cut financing for Planned Parenthood in 2012.
lead_paragraph: The breast cancer charity Susan G. Komen for the Cure said Tuesday that it was canceling walks next year in seven cities where fund-raising goals have not been met.

keywords.value: Komen, Susan G, for the Cure
keywords.name: organizations
